group_1.narration: Just a little over a year ago, I was fighting@alongside my friends from Mikazuki Villa, but...
After Yachiyo left and our group disbanded,@I've been fighting alone ever since.
As you can see, back then I was the@"self-proclaimed mightiest Magical Girl"!
Because I AM the strongest, even with the team gone...
I was determined to protect Sankyo Ward all on my own!
That was when I met Iroha.
At first, I mistook her for a customer and practically@dragged her into the shop, but...
While we were talking, I found out—totally unexpectedly—that she@was a Magical Girl, and that she was investigating [textBlue:Rumors], too!
In that case, I thought it would be best to ask THAT person...
So I made up my mind, steeled myself...@and decided to call Yachiyo.
Yeah, I called on a whim at the time,@but Yachiyo actually agreed to meet with us!
After that, the three of us discussed and investigated a [textBlue:Rumor].
Maybe it was because it had been so long since@I'd done anything like that with Yachiyo,
but I got so caught up in the moment then@that I ended up saying this:
"This is so much fun!@It's just like we've gone back to the old days!"
But there was no response from her...
It felt like Yachiyo was saying,@"We can't go back to the way things used to be."
It's not reflected in the memories we're seeing now,@but at the time, it was circling around in my mind.
"Because Tsuruno is strong—"@I remember when Yachiyo said that and pushed me away.
So I regretted it immediately and@wondered why I even said it.
"This is so much fun! It's just like we've gone back to the old days!"@...Those words slipped out of me so easily.@It was proof of how much I really wanted to go back to the past.
Even I was surprised at myself!
...Yes, after reuniting with Yachiyo for the first time@in a while, I came to understand something.
